Methods

public Decimal calculate(
  Decimal amount,
  Boolean isDomesticTransaction
)

Calculate the Stripe service fees for a given USD amount

Parameters:
    amount – Decimal: amount in USD to calculate the service fees for
    isDomesticTransaction – Boolean: if true then domestic fees apply, otherwise international fees apply

Returns:
    [Decimal] Stripe fees in USD for the transaction
